channel.title: CVE Feed for Pdfcrowd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pdfcrowd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-40668|2023-09-27T06:31:06.054Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd plugin <= 2.16.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40665|2023-09-27T06:24:24.410Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20image%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as Image plugin by Pdfcrowd plugin <= 2.16.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-33684|2024-06-04T17:43:50.890Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31930|2024-06-04T17:37:05.355Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.1 .

item.title: CVE-2024-35649|2024-06-05T17:15:39.673Z -- pdfcrowd -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pdfcrowd Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Save as PDF plugin by Pdfcrowd: from n/a through 3.2.3.
